guide.introduction: For too long my workbench has been home to a jumbled collection of miscellaneous wire spools. I searched a bit for a commercial solution without any luck. Then suddenly a simple solution came to mind - curtain rod brackets!
guide.introduction_rendered:
For too long my workbench has been home to a jumbled collection of miscellaneous wire spools. I searched a bit for a commercial solution without any luck. Then suddenly a simple solution came to mind - curtain rod brackets!

Relevant parts
  • Wooden dowel
  • curtain rod brackets
Tools
  • Marker
  • Phillips head screwdriver
  • Saw
  • hand-held electric drill

lines.text: Find a suitable place for mounting the rack.  Close to your work area is usually ideal.
lines.text_raw: Find a suitable place for mounting the rack.  Close to your work area is usually ideal.

lines.text: Measure the desired length you'd like the rack to be, and mark the dowel for cutting.
lines.text_raw: Measure the desired length you'd like the rack to be, and mark the dowel for cutting.

lines.text: Cut the dowel to the desired length.
lines.text_raw: Cut the dowel to the desired length.

lines.text: Mark and drill holes for the brackets using a pencil/marker.
lines.text_raw: Mark and drill holes for the brackets using a pencil/marker.

lines.text: Use a ruler+level for accuracy.  Since I mounted mine on a shelf, I used the shelf as a guide.
lines.text_raw: Use a ruler+level for accuracy.  Since I mounted mine on a shelf, I used the shelf as a guide.

lines.text: Mount the brackets in their new home.
lines.text_raw: Mount the brackets in their new home.

lines.text: Rod brackets usually come with appropriate wood screws for mounting.  Since I mounted mine to metal, I used similar size nuts, bolts & washers I had on hand.
lines.text_raw: Rod brackets usually come with appropriate wood screws for mounting.  Since I mounted mine to metal, I used similar size nuts, bolts & washers I had on hand.

lines.text: Thread your wire spools onto the dowel.
lines.text_raw: Thread your wire spools onto the dowel.

lines.text: Secure the dowel in place via the bracket thumbscrews.
lines.text_raw: Secure the dowel in place via the bracket thumbscrews.

lines.text: Done. Enjoy a more orderly workspace and convenient access to various wire types!
lines.text_raw: Done. Enjoy a more orderly workspace and convenient access to various wire types!

guide.summary: Build a basic wire rack for keeping wire spools organized and easily accessible at the workbench.
guide.title: Quick & Easy Wire Rack
